required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of General Characteristics of Patients Diagnosed SarsCoV2 (Coronavirus )Positive Followed In Service
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of General Characteristics of Patients Diagnosed SarsCoV2 Positive Followed In Service

brief_summary.textblock: comparison of general characteristics of patients diagnosed SarsCoV2 positive followed In service

detailed_description.textblock: After the explanation about the study is made, informed consent form will be obtained from the pregnant women who were hospitalized in the pandemic gynecology service (D block 10th floor pandemic obstetrics service) due to covid 19 and who agreed to participate in the study. In our study, the clinical status of pregnant patients with SarsCoV2 positive test results, who were followed up and treated in the pandemic service in Başakşehir Çam and Sakura City Hospital, will be obtained by asking the patient about the symptoms and vaccination status in the patient follow-up form prepared in advance. Laboratory findings and imaging results ( CT/posteroanterior X-ray) will be obtained from the recorded data.

primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants diagnosed of polymerase chain reaction assay Positive SarsCoV2 followed İn service
Vaccinated patients who were followed up in the service due to SarsCoV2
non-Vaccinated patients who were followed up in the service due to SarsCoV2
rate of nonVaccinated -Vaccined Participants who were followed up in the service due to SarsCoV2
rate of covid common symptoms (cough, fever, shortness of breath ,sore throat ) in vaccinated and unvaccinated patients

rate of lymphocyte and albumin levels , C-reactive protein (CRP), D-dimer, Ferritin, lactate dehydrogenase(LDH), neutrophil lymphocyte ratio (NLR), platelet lymphocyte ratio (PLR) and C-reactive protein albumin ratio (CAR) levels in vaccinated and unvaccinated patients

arm_group.description: Pregnant patients with positive PCR (polymerase chain reaction assay ) Covid test results, who were followed up and treated in the pandemic service of Başakşehir Çam and Sakura City Hospital.

study_pop.textblock: Pregnant patients with positive SarsCoV 2 test results, who were followed up and treated in the pandemic service of Çam and Sakura City Hospital.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: Pregnant patients positive SarsCoV 2 test results followed up and treated in the pandemic service of Çam and Sakura City Hospital.
Exclusion Criteria: no exclusion criteria
-

facility.name: Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Maternal-Fetal Medicine Unit, Başakşehir City Hospital, Hamidiye School of Medicine, University of Health Sciences,
